query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM telegram_channels WHERE isActive = 1) as canais_ativos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM integrations WHERE type = 'ai') as agentes_ia,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM telegram_messages) as mensagens_total;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 46yA7HaDwBP5MYq.0cfa392d87a6 --database FgFuwHSp9rkJkcaPADwYhA --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM telegram_channels WHERE isActive = 1) as canais_ativos,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM integrations WHERE type = 'ai') as agentes_ia,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM telegram_messages) as mensagens_total;
